articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Air Force Unit
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected Air Force Unit 1016 of the KPA.
					 He was greeted on the spot by Col. General of the KPA Ri Pyong Chol, commander of the air force of the KPA, and other general officers and commanding officers of the unit. 
					
					 After acquainting himself with its performance of duty, he looked round halls for flight training and watched airmen under training.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled to boost the combat capability of the unit in every way, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the unit is steadily raising the level of technical skill of its airmen after successfully building training facilities by its own efforts and performing its guard duty in a responsible manner with a high degree of vigilance to cope with the enemies' moves for aggression.
					
					 He learned about how the political work is conducted among its servicepersons, going round a soldiers' hall, education room and other cultural and educational facilities. 
					
					 He got familiar in detail with how various kinds of visual aid materials and CDs are used to suit the peculiarities of servicepersons and praised the unit for conducting ideological and educational work in diverse forms and by various methods and in a unique manner, underscoring the need to pay primary attention to the ideological work to prepare all of them as human bombs and self-blasting heroes of Ri Su Bok and Kil Yong Jo type.
					
					 Noting that the appearance of soldiers is one of the important criteria proving the dignity, spirit and discipline of a regular army, he said that the revolutionary army of the DPRK, a highly disciplined regular army, should set an example in dressing and appearance.
					
					 He took warm care of the servicepersons' living with fatherly love, going round a bedroom, mess hall, kitchen and supply service facilities.
					
					 All units of the KPA have brought about a radical change in their appearance by concentrating efforts on boosting their combat capabilities and management, he said, adding that this signal change is the shining fruition of a high degree of revolutionary character, militancy and sense of organization and discipline peculiar to the KPA.
					
					 He had a photo session with servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Central Africa
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Central Africa
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Francois Bozize, President of Central Africa, on November 28 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the proclamation of the Central African Republic.
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam wished the president of Central Africa success in his work for the consolidation of national reconciliation, unity and peace and reconstruction of economy.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Barbados
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Barbados
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, on November 26 sent a message of greetings to David Thompson, Prime Minister of Barbados, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message wished him great success in his noble work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: Pomminryon Releases Joint Resolution
articles.content:
Pomminryon Releases Joint Resolution
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The North Headquarters, the South Headquarters and Overseas Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a joint resolution on Sunday on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					 Pomminryon has served as a base for great unity as it helps pool the efforts of all Koreans, and the solidarity among compatriots in the north and the south and abroad provided a powerful engine dynamically propelling their movement for independent reunification, the joint resolution says, and goes on:
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" in the June 15 era of reunification has been firmly enshrined by the Koreans as patriotic idea for reunification and the spirit for national cooperation and unity has run higher than ever before everywhere Pomminryon conducted its activities.
					
					 It is necessary to foil the anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and make a breakthrough toward the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and independent reunification and peace and prosperity of the country through the great national unity.
					
					 Pomminryon will achieve the great unity of all Koreans, strengthen the driving force of the nation in every way and intensify the actions for defending and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, resolutely foiling all sorts of moves of anti-reunification forces, under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 It will also frustrate the Lee Myung Bak regime's suppression under the pretext of "security" and have the "National Security Law" repealed by the concerted efforts of pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					 The history of shining victories won by Pomminryon in its actions is a proof of the validity of its movement and the pride and honor enshrined by its members serve as a tremendous motive force encouraging the Koreans to carry out the duty to achieve reunification. 
					
					 No one can deter Pomminryon from advancing, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself," and the nation's cause of independent reunification is sure to be accomplished.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A government economic delegation of the DPRK led by Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam left here today to visit Singapore and Malaysia.

articles.title: Minister of General Administration of Sport of China Interviewed
articles.content:
Minister of General Administration of Sport of China Interviewed
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Liu Peng, minister of the General Administration of Sport of China, said that China would conduct brisk sports exchange with the DPRK in the future, too, to make a positive contribution to boosting the Sino-DPRK friendship, when interviewed by KCNA before his departure from Pyongyang at the end of the visit. 
					 I was deeply impressed to see Pyongyang which has been splendidly built into a beautiful city and people full of vigor, he said, and went on:
					
					The Korean people have registered great achievements in socialist construction under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President performed great feats for the country and its people.
					
					 He paid deep attention to the building and development of new China.
					
					 The Chinese people profoundly revere him.
					
					 He always lives in the hearts of not only the Korean people but of the Chinese people.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship provided by Chairman Mao Zedong and President Kim Il Sung is growing stronger day by day under the deep care of Hu Jintao and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the Korean people will achieve bigger successes in socialist construction under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Fields of Underground Resources Discovered
articles.content:
Fields of Underground Resources Discovered
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Promising fields of underground resources were discovered in the DPRK.
					 Nonmetallic mineral resources including coal were discovered in South Phyongan Province, fields of iron ore in South Hwanghae and Kangwon Provinces, nonferrous metal and minerals reserve sites in Ryanggang Province and fields of minerals and water resources in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The officials and members of different provincial geological prospecting corps of the Administration Bureau for Prospecting keep pushing forward the work to find out more underground resources.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Campaign to Suppress Chongryon Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Campaign to Suppress Chongryon Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities' politically motivated suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) is an unpardonable state-sponsored criminal act, says Minju Joson Saturday in a signed commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Business organizations of Chongryon can never be targets of suppression as they have worked hard to protect the business activities of Korean workers in commerce and their right to existence, while abiding by the Japanese law. And the issue of "income tax" for which the Japanese reactionaries hold a member of the Tokyo Metropolitan Shinjuku Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan accountable was settled one and a half years ago.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries conducted a search operation against several offices on the false charge of "violation of the law on taxation". A sinister aim sought by them through this is to weaken the above-said organization and tear Korean workers in commerce off Chongryon in a bid to ultimately bring down the financial foundation of Chongryon and destroy Chongryon. 
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the Japanese reactionaries are using the politically motivated suppression of Chongryon as a lever for executing their hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the Japanese reactionaries' unreasonable and brazen-faced politically motivated suppression of Chongryon.  
					
					 They would be well advised to bear this in mind and stop at once such suppression of Chongryon and human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: U.S. War Maniacs' Attempt at Igniting War against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. War Maniacs' Attempt at Igniting War against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. war maniacs are contemplating equipping its forces present in south Korea with latest war hardware. It is evidently dangerous arms buildup to unleash a new war, a nuclear war, on the Korean Peninsula, Minju Joson today observes this in a by-lined commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What is noteworthy is that the U.S. is reinforcing its forces with main focus put on its navy and air force.
					
					 Clear is a sinister aim sought by the U.S. by replacing the structure of its armed forces centering on the ground force by the one centering on the navy and air force. 
					
					 The U.S. war-like forces are greatly fearful that they may sustain retaliatory strike from the Korean People's Army in case they ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK. In other words, they scheme to let the south Korean puppet army engage in ground warfare and their forces play main roles in the sea and sky in fighting the war of aggression on the DPRK to be launched by them in a bid to minimize their casualties.
					
					 If the U.S. forces stationed in south Korea are reorganized as the forces centering on the navy and air force, the danger of the outbreak of the war will increase on the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. forces centering on the naval and air forces can mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK any moment. The combined landing drill of the south Korean marine corps and the U.S. marines and the taking off and landing exercise on runway for an emergency use staged recently within the framework of the Hoguk exercises are a clear proof of it.
					
					 Should the U.S. war-like forces ignite a war at any cost they will sustain more miserable defeat than what they suffered in the Korean war in the 50s of the last century, the commentary warned, saying that the U.S. had better stop dangerous arms buildup for provoking a war of aggression on the DPRK and pull its forces out of south Korea at once.

articles.title: WPK's Policy on Preserving National Character
articles.content:
WPK's Policy on Preserving National Character
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to value the national character and successfully inherit and develop it.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article. It continues:
					
					 The leadership of the WPK for positively preserving the national character is a main factor for training all the people as genuine patriots in the Songun era with the strong sense of self-respect, a source of bringing into full bloom the national culture in all fabrics of social life and a powerful engine for the struggle for national unity and reunification.
					
					 It is unthinkable without the far-sighted leadership of the WPK that the Korean nation-first spirit has become part of the mental world of all the people and the slogan "Let us live our own way!" a motto of the life and struggle and firm faith of all the servicepersons and people.
					
					 The proud appearance of the country firmly maintaining the independent stand in the international arenas displaying its might as an invincible political and ideological power and a matchless military power helps the Korean people have great national pride and self-respect of holding the great Songun brilliant commander in high esteem and being under the leadership of the great party. 
					
					 National dress, folk games and advantageous etiquette of the nation are positively encouraged and it has become the trend of the Songun era to enjoy national holidays including full moon day in January. The Koreans positively use native Korean language favored by all Koreans and dance and sing to the tune of Korean music. This is the appearance of the dignified Korean people.
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration in line with the desire of the Koreans for reunification were adopted by the leading and active efforts of the WPK and the new era of history is opened up for achieving the national reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself". 
					
					A very rosy future is in store for the country and the nation thanks to the seasoned leadership of the great party to value the national character and successfully inherit and develop it.

articles.title: Foiling Imperialists' War Policy and Domination Moves Called for
articles.content:
Foiling Imperialists' War Policy and Domination Moves Called for
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- It is the common task of the progressive people of the world to keep peace and hasten development of human civilization in the 21st century, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					 Noting that the imperialists' moves for aggression and war are being more openly committed under the spurious veil of "peace-keeping" in the present century and they assume greater danger, the article goes on:
					
					 The imperialist aggression forces have waged undisguised military interference and acts of aggression against independent countries under the signboard of "contribution to freedom and democracy" and "peace-keeping" after labeling those countries "dangerous states" and "dictatorial society" as they please.
					
					 Hideous destruction and man-killings have been committed and independent development of countries are seriously deterred everywhere the imperialists ignite wars of aggression under the watchword of "peace-keeping."
					
					 The world people cannot defend sovereignty of their countries, much less achieving development of human civilization in the new century, unless they frustrate the imperialists' war policy and their moves for domination.
					
					 If they fail to frustrate the imperialists' arbitrary and highhanded practices and war moves, they cannot but fall victim to their policy for aggression and domination.
					
					 The key to averting war and preserving peace lies in the struggle against imperialism and it provides a sure guarantee for independent progress and development of human civilization in the new century.
					
					 All the peace-loving peoples should uphold the banner of independence and peace against imperialism in order to foil the war moves of the imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 If the peace-loving people hold higher the banner of the struggle for peace against war, the imperialists' moves for aggression and domination will go to ruin and favorable circumstances be created for carrying out the human cause of independence, cause of peace.
					
					 The Korean people will dynamically wage the struggle to foil the war policy and moves for domination by the imperialist aggression forces under the uplifted banner of Songun so as to make positive contributions to defending sovereignty of the country and socialism and advancing the cause of world independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Police Suppression of Protest Actions Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Police Suppression of Protest Actions Slammed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on November 22 denounced the puppet police for blocking a sit-in strike on the situation to shatter the suppression of candlelight actions and the case against the above-said solidarity and abolish the "National Security Law".
					 The organization recalled that the group of sit-in strikers has staged a signature campaign demanding a stop to the suppression of candlelight actions and soapbox oratory laying bare the treacherous nature of the Lee Myung Bak regime after pitching tents in front of the Posin Pavilion in Seoul every day since October 6.
					
					 It accused the police of preventing them from pitching tents on the charge that the sit-in strike is in violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration" and the "law on traffic" though it was the 48th day since their start of the strike.
					
					 Branding the action taken by the police to check the tent pitching, terming it "an illegal act," as suppression of the sit-in strike, the organization declared that it would launch various activities to counter it.

articles.title: Lee Group Urged to Drop Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Group Urged to Drop Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Women organizations including the Women's Solidarity of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 25 at which they urged the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to halt the anti-reunification confrontational moves and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					 A press release read out at the press conference deplored that the anti-reunification confrontational policy pursued by the Lee "government" brought to naught all the achievements made after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and inter-Korean relations reached the phase of total severance.
					
					 The press release accused Lee of unhesitatingly crying that "it is his final goal to unify the country under the liberal democratic system" and bringing someone's "human rights" issue even to the UN, pursuant to the policy of outside forces, in a bid to escalate the confrontation with the north. 
					
					 Speakers at the press conference denounced the treacherous and anti-reunification moves of the Lee "government" to bring the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation, talking about "pragmatism."
					
					 It is the only way of saving the north-south relations from their collapse to thoroughly implement the above-said declarations, they stressed.

articles.title: Parliamentary Decision on Increasing Military Spending Flayed
articles.content:
Parliamentary Decision on Increasing Military Spending Flayed
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 85th rally for peace and disarmament in Seoul on Nov. 25, denouncing the puppet authorities for their moves to increase military expenditure.
					 A letter of protest to the puppet National Assembly was read out there. 
					
					 The "NA National Defense Committee", when examining the budget for military funds for fiscal 2009, put additional funds for the research into tanks and copters for attack and the introduction of infantry armored vehicles to the budget bill already increased 7.8% as compared with that for this year, the letter said.
					
					 The letter exposed that issues related to the funds for the introduction of such weapons for preemptive attack as early warning and control plane, the expansion of Mugon-ri drill ground, the transfer of the U.S. military bases and the upkeep of the U.S. forces were approved as demanded by the present "government", referring to the fact that the expenditure for the building of a naval base on Jeju Island increased to tens of billions of wons.
					
					 To spend so much money for the military affairs is an act of going against the peace and disarmament on the Korean Peninsula and pushing the people into bigger suffering, the letter condemned.
					
					 Urging the need to stop the moves for increasing military spending, the letter stated that they would expose and punish without fail the crimes of the members of the "NA National Defense Committee."

articles.title: Defense Ministry's Unwarranted Step Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Defense Ministry's Unwarranted Step Assailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Green Federation, an environmental movement organization of south Korea, issued a statement on Nov. 25 in which it accused the puppet Defense Ministry of taking an unfair step to impose the expenses of de-polluting the degraded environment in the U.S. military bases upon local self-governing bodies. 
					 The statement stated that the amount of expenses of de-polluting the degraded soil and purifying the polluted groundwater in the 17 U.S. military bases to be taken over from the U.S troops present in south Korea are over twice what the ministry announced last year.
					
					 The ministry is contemplating burdening local self-governing bodies with the above-said expenses, the statement said, holding that the ministry should bear full responsibility for its humiliating handling of the issue of expenses of de-polluting the degraded environment in the U.S. military bases.

articles.title: More Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated against DPRK
articles.content:
More Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces committed at least 110 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK in November and the south Korean puppet armed forces more than 90 cases in the same period, according to a military source.
					 The U.S. imperialists flew south Korea-based U-2 to spy on areas of the DPRK on Nov. 27 and 28. This plane perpetrated such espionage dozens of times. 
					
					 Overseas-based RC-135 of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces flew in the air above south Korea to make shuttle flights for committing aerial observation and photographing of the depth of the DPRK and all its other areas on Nov. 14 and 19. Their RC-12 and RC-7B numbering three perpetrated similar espionage on Nov. 29.
					
					 Many tactical reconnaissance and commanding planes of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet armed forces with different missions were busy flying in the sky over the frontline areas to conduct intensive aerial espionage against the DPRK. The number of such type planes involved reached at least 50 from Nov. 1 to 8 when Hoguk joint war exercises for aggression were underway and more than 10 on Nov. 26 when combined air battle exercises were kicked off. 
					
					 Two or three RC-800s and RF-4Cs of the war-like forces of the south Korean puppet armed forces made shuttle flights round-the-clock almost every day to perpetrate aerial observation and espionage against areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The aerial espionage timed to coincide with the Hoguk joint war exercises, fleet mobile war exercises and combined air battle exercises clearly indicates that the wild ambition of the U.S. imperialists and warmongers of the south Korean puppet armed forces to make a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.

articles.title: Japanese Police Suppression of Chongryon Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Police Suppression of Chongryon Flayed
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese police authorities searched offices of the Federation of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan and the Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) housed in the Hall of Korean Workers in Commerce in Tokyo on November 27.
					 After arresting So Yong Nam, former vice-chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Shinjuku Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan, on the charge of "violation of the law on taxation" that morning, the security department of the Tokyo Police Agency conducted an illegal search operation against those offices, claiming that the above-said organizations were linked with him.
					
					 Enraged at the police suppression, officials of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and Tokyo Metropolis and other parts of Kanto area, officials of associations of workers in commerce and Korean workers in commerce angrily protested against the suppression, shouting slogans "We protest politically motivated suppression of Chongryon!"
					
					 The Japanese police authorities stretched the tentacles of suppression even to the Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan and the Federation of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan, a central organization of Chongryon, in the wake of the search for several places including the Tokyo Metropolitan Shinjuku Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan on the charge of "violation of the law on taxation" on October 29. This is an unpardonable politically motivated crackdown upon all Chongryon organizations and a base move to threaten Korean workers in commerce in Japan in a bid to financially suffocate Chongryon.

articles.title: Japan's Moves against Chongryon and DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Moves against Chongryon and DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The international community is strongly denouncing the Japanese authorities for becoming all the more reckless in their hostile moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Speakers at the 5th meeting of the international solidarity conference demanding Japan's redemption of its past held in Hague said that to make apology and reparation to the victims is the duty of the Japanese government from an international legal point of view, vehemently denouncing the unjustness and moral vulgarity of the Japan's moves to evade the redemption of its past.
					
					 A meeting of the coordinators of the above-said international solidarity conference held in Manila discussed issues on widely organizing colorful activities for the redemption of Japan's past in different countries of the world including an issue of expanding to the U.S. and Europe the struggle demanding Japan's redemption of its past crimes and against the distortion of history and an issue of building up international public opinion over the issue of remains of Korean victims of forcible drafting.
					
					 The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation and the chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden in letters sent to the Japanese government and its chief executive demanded that Japan make reparation for its crimes and stop at once suppression of Chongryon, discrimination against Koreans in Japan and sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general of the Asian Regional Committee to Support Korea's Reunification asserted that Japan should make apology and reparation for the huge crimes it committed against Korean people in the past and stop pursuing hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 People of various circles of Japan, too, held colorful functions demanding the normalization of the relations between the DPRK and Japan, the lift of sanctions against the DPRK, the sincere repentance of and reparation for history of colonial rule and stop of suppression of Chongryon, and condemning the move to seize Tok Islet and tamper with history, and waged protest actions.

articles.title: Korean Jewel-Powdered Painting Exhibition Held in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Jewel-Powdered Painting Exhibition Held in Russia
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A Korean jewel-powdered painting exhibition was held in Nizhuny Novgorod, Russia from Oct. 24 to Nov. 18.
					 Russian figures of various circles, citizens and diplomatic envoys of different countries in Russia looked round the venue of the exhibition.
					
					 Russian media including "Argumenti I Fakti" introduced Korean jewel-powdered paintings in detail, adding that people should know the fact that the art works truthfully representing the wisdom and noble and pure feelings of the Koreans are being created under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad No. 1016 de las fuerzas aereas del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad No. 1016 de las fuerzas aereas del EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Unidad No.1016 de las fuerzas aereas del EPC.
					  Le acogieron en el terreno el comandante de las fuerzas aereas del EPC, coronel general Ri Pyong Chol y otros generales y los oficiales directivos de la unidad.
					
					  Tras averiguar el estado de cumplimiento de la mision de la unidad, vio el entrenamiento de los pilotos recorriendo las salas acondicionadas para este fin.
					
					  Presento las tareas para fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad de la unidad mostrandose satisfecho de que ella eleva sin cesar el nivel tecnico de los aviadores a traves de los equipos de entrenamiento preparados magnificamente por cuenta propia y cumple con responsabilidad y alta vigilancia la guardia avanzada frente a las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos.
					
					  Acto seguido, se informo detalladamente del estado de la labor politica sobre los militares pasando revista a la casa de los militares, la sala de educacion y otras facilidades culturales y educacionales.
					
					  Al averiguar minuciosamente la situacion del uso de medios visuales y grabaciones de video de diferentes generos, convenientes a las caracteristicas de los uniformados, elogio que esta unidad realiza de diversas formas y con metodos originales la labor ideologica y educativa.
					
					  Subrayo que se debe dar primordial atencion a la labor ideologica para formar a todos los militares como heroes dispuestos a estallarse como bombas como Ri Su Bok y Kil Yong Jo.
					
					  El Dirigente senalo que la apariencia del militar es un importante indice que demuestra la cualidad, el espiritu, la disciplina y el orden de un ejercito regular y anadio que el revolucionario EPC altamente regularizado debe ser el modelo tambien en el modo de vestirse y arreglarse.
					
					  Acto seguido, atendio con amor paternal la vida de los militares recorriendo el dormitorio, comedor, cocina y otras instalaciones de intendencia.
					
					  Indico que todas las unidades del EPC renovaron su fisonomia al enfocar las fuerzas al fortalecimiento de la combatividad y a la administracion de la unidad y prosiguio que este cambio esplendido es el valioso fruto del gran espiritu revolucionario y combativo, la organizacion y la disciplina que caracterizan al EPC.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad.
					
					  Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente indio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente indio
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica de la India, Pratibha Patil, en relacion con que fueron ocasionadas grandes perdidas humadas a causa de los ataques terroristas simultaneos en Mumbay.
					  La misiva senala que el gobierno de la RPDC, que se opone al terrorismo de toda indole y a cualquier apoyo a este, condena categoricamente ese inhumano y atroz atentado terrorista en la India y se solidariza firmemente con los esfuerzos del gobierno indio por reparar la situacion y mantener la estabilidad social.

articles.title: Publicada resolucion conjunta en acto por aniversario 18 de APRP
articles.content:
Publicada resolucion conjunta en acto por aniversario 18 de APRP
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ATCC) -- La direccion nortena, la surena y la ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional para la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publicaron el dia 30 una resolucion conjunta en el acto conmemorativo del 18o aniversario de la constitucion de esta entidad.
					La constitucion de la APRP devino el foco de la gran unidad para aunar las fuerzas de todos los coreanos y la solidaridad tripartita entre el Norte, el Sur y ultramar funciona como fuerza motriz para llevar adelante el movimiento nacional por la reunificacion independiente, senala la nota y continua: 
					
					En todas las partes, donde la APRP desarrolla sus actividades, la nacion coreana guarda en lo profundo de su corazon el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio como el ideal de patriotismo por la reintegracion territorial y se acentua el clima de cooperacion y unidad nacionales. 
					
					Hay que frustrar con la gran unidad pannacional las maniobras anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas divisionistas internas y externas y abrir la brecha de la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					La APRP lograra la gran unidad de toda la nacion y consolidara por todos los medios las fuerzas subjetivas nacionales. 
					
					Con la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" en alto, rechazara tajantemente todas las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y desplegara activamente la lucha por defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Ademas, frustrara con las fuerzas unidas de los patriotas pro-reunificacion la represion policial del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak y anulara la "ley de seguridad". 
					
					La orgullosa trayectoria victoriosa de la APRP confirma la justeza de su movimiento. El honor y dignidad guardados en el alma de todos sus miembros sirven de gran fuerza promotora para cumplir la tarea de reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Nadie puede detener el avance de la APRP que marcha con el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y sera cumplida sin falta la causa de reunificacion independiente de la nacion.

articles.title: Autoridades policiales de Japon recrudecen represion a Chongryon
articles.content:
Autoridades policiales de Japon recrudecen represion a Chongryon
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El pasado dia 27, las autoridades policiales de Japon cometieron de manera forzada el registro sobre las oficinas de la Federacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Japon, entidad de nivel central de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y de la Asociacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Japon de la metropoli de Tokio, que estan ubicadas en la Casa de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Tokio.
					Ese dia por la manana la direccion de seguridad publica de la Agencia de Policia de Tokio arresto al ex vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Japon en Shinjuku de la metropoli de Tokio, So Yong Nam, bajo la sospecha de la "violacion de la ley del recaudador de impuestos" y cometio ese registro ilegal y forzado diciendo que aquellas entidades estan vinculadas con el detenido. 
					
					Esta feroz campana policial desato la gran indignacion de los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Chongryon y de las filiales de esta en la metropoli de Tokio y la zona de Kanto, los funcionarios de la Asociacion de Comerciantes e Industriales y los compatriotas de estas caracteristicas, quienes la rechazaron fuertemente gritando la consigna "No a la represion politica contra la Chongryon".
					
					El pasado 29 de octubre, la policia japonesa habia cometido el mismo crimen bajo la misma sospecha contra la Asociacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Japon en Shinjuku de la metropoli de Tokio y otros puntos.
					
					La escalada de la acometida policial resulta intolerable acto fascista politico contra todas las organizaciones de la Chongryon y sucia maniobra para asfixiarla financieramente amenazando a los comerciantes e industriales coreanos residentes en ese pais isleno.
